### Steps to reproduce the issue

On Summit, with a fresh clone of Spack as of yesterday (2ae7e2550175fb6decfc9bc9d4af5c47b881413e):

```console
$ spack install py-numpy
...
numpy/core/src/common/simd/vsx/operators.h:133:29: error: implicit declaration of function 
             'vec_cmpne' [-Werror=implicit-function-declaration]
...
numpy/core/src/_simd/_simd.dispatch.c.src:314:1: error: AltiVec argument passed to unprotot
             yped function
...
```
